title: GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_ROOM_FROM
content:
0xAA9C141D// GetInteriorPortalRoomFrom
int GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_ROOM_FROM(int interiorId, int portalIndex);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.portalIndex: Interior portal index.Returns: Portal's room FROM index.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local roomIndex = 0

  local portalRoomFrom = GetInteriorPortalRoomFrom(interiorId, 0)
  print("portal " .. roomIndex .. " room FROM is: " .. portalRoomFrom)
end
codeBlocks:
// GetInteriorPortalRoomFrom
int GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_ROOM_FROM(int interiorId, int portalIndex);

local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local roomIndex = 0

  local portalRoomFrom = GetInteriorPortalRoomFrom(interiorId, 0)
end
